author: lopes.joe
title: Marketplace P2P
description: Many self-employed professionals could offer online services increasing their reach and do not do so for lack of end-to-end solutions.
solution: Create an end-to-end platform that enables varied self-employed professionals to provide their services online and intermediating payments.
experience: As founder, I have training and experience in business and information systems working as a Delivery DevOps Manager for almost 9 years.
